FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the course id were the block exists

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the full name of the instance

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_level
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_level holds the level information and names

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_subtype
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_subtype holds the subtypes used in all qualifications

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_type_family
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_type_family holds the families of the qual types

FIELD.NAME: classfolderlocation
FIELD.COMMENT: This is where the class can be found. The class will assume to be called {family}Qualification, where family is the name in the database. So for example BTECQualification will be the class. The class file location needs to be from Moodle. So for example "/mod/bcgtbtec/classes/BTECQualification.class.php"

FIELD.NAME: pluginname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the plugin name and folder name in the plugins directory

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_pathway_type
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_pathway_type holds the link between pathways and types

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_pathway_dep
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_pathway_dep holds the information that links pathways to departments for CG quals

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_pathway_dep_type
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_pathway_dep_type holds the information that links department, type and pathway for CG quals

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_pathway_subtype
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_pathway_subtype holds the information that links the pathway and subtype for a city and guild qual

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_type
TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_type holds the types of qualifications

TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_user_qual holds the users qualification and comments

FIELD.COMMENT: This is the role of the user, so student, teacher, tutor, manager etc

TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_user_test holds the users test values

TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_user_outcome_obs holds the observations or the user against their outcomes

TABLE.COMMENT: block_bcgt_user_target holds the users target grade and averege score.

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_tabs
TABLE.COMMENT: This table conists of the tabs that can possibly be displayed on the dashboard

FIELD.NAME: tabclassfile
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the file that the Tab Class is location in. Please make this relevant to Moodle. i.e. /mod/whatever/bcgttab.class.php or /block/whatever/lib.php (where the lib contains the tab). Rather than /whatever/file.php as the scripts will look from Moodle.

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_user_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: When in BCGT the users in here can be assigned managers or mentors of other users.

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_target_qual_att
TABLE.COMMENT: Attributes for the target quals. Such as default number of years, default no of credits. etc

TABLE.COMMENT: This consists of unit type attributes. This is things like default credits at certain levels

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_mod_linking
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the table that contains the mods we support the auto linking and due dates for. Please note that bcgt will allow the linking of Grade Tracker with ANY gradeable mod.

FIELD.NAME: moduleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The is the id of the module from modules.

FIELD.NAME: modtablename
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the modules table. E.g. assign would be assign, assignment is assignment, turnitin is turnitintool . Therefore its not always consistant.

FIELD.NAME: modtablecoursefname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the course field name in the mod table. For example it may be courseid or it may be course. This is the course that the module has been added to.

FIELD.NAME: modtableduedatefname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the optional field name of the due date column in the mod table. E.g what are we querying to find the due date of a module. TimeDue, Date due, due date etc. Not all mods will have this.

FIELD.NAME: modsubmissiontable
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the table that we are looking to see about the submissions or attempts of the module. E.g. for assign its assign_submssions.

FIELD.NAME: submissionuserfname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the column where the userid is stored in the modules submission table. E.g. is it user or is it userid.

FIELD.NAME: submissiondatefname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the column where we find what date the submission was made/attempted. e,g. datecreated, datesubmitted.

FIELD.NAME: submissionmodidfname
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the column where we will find the id of the module instance from the module table associated with this submission. E.g. in assign_submission the module instance id is found in the column assignment.

FIELD.NAME: checkforautotracking
FIELD.COMMENT: This denotes if we are going to check and alter the tracking sheets that are linked to these mods for the values of IN, NOT IN and LATE.

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_alps_scores
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_register_groups
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_user_reg_groups
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: T = Teacher/Tutor L = Learner

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_tqual_weight
TABLE.COMMENT: The plugins table

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_archive
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: componentid
FIELD.COMMENT: This could be the userid, the qualid, projectid etc etc

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: This is an INT number. What it corresponds to, as in the the english type, can be found as a Constant on the Archive class. This has been done as an INT to speed up querying

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_stud_unit_sets
TABLE.COMMENT: This is where you can save a set of units to quickly add students to the same set

FIELD.NAME: bcgtunitids
FIELD.COMMENT: List of ids separated by commas. E.g. 1,2,3,4

TABLE.NAME: block_bcgt_files
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me
